definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="173" y="121"><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">show_tooltips</field><field name="comment">If disabled, extra data from the mod will not show up in item tooltips.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Show Item Tooltips</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">show_scale</field><field name="comment">If disabled, radiation counters will not show the extra overlay in the bottom-left of the screen.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Show Radiation Scale</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
